_description: Cross-project persistent memory MCP server configurations

setup_commands.engram: claude-workspace mcp add --scope user engram -- engram mcp
setup_commands.memory: claude mcp add --scope user memory -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-memory

notes.engram: Auto-registered by claude-workspace setup. Go binary with FTS5 full-text search and SQLite persistence. Install: brew install gentleman-programming/tap/engram. Data: ~/.engram/engram.db
notes.memory: Legacy option. Node.js JSONL-based knowledge graph with substring search only. No install needed beyond Node.js (uses npx).
